Uses of Class
com.i2group.apollo.service.common.InvalidArgumentException

  • Packages that use InvalidArgumentException 
    Package Description
    com.i2group.apollo.adminservice
    The i2 Analyze admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.
    com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedretrievalservice
    The i2 Analyze alert feed retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve alert feeds and determine which ones they are subscribed to.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.alertretrievalservice
    The i2 Analyze alert retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve the alerts generated by alert feeds.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.auditservice
    The i2 Analyze audit service provides clients with the ability to retrieve audit information about changes to items in the Analysis Repository.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.client
    Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with i2 Analyze through the supplied Java client.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.delpsservice
    The i2 Analyze DELPS service provides clients with the ability to interact with data load ELP stage solutions.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.retrievalservice
    An i2 Analyze external data retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve live information from an external data provider that has already been the subject of data acquisition.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice
    An i2 Analyze external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice
    An i2 Analyze external data subset exploration service provides clients with the ability to retrieve information from a subset of data that has been created from an external data provider.
    com.i2group.apollo.infoservice
    The i2 Analyze info service provides clients with a variety of functionality that is relevant to the whole system.
    com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice
    The standard i2 Analyze item history service provides clients with the ability to look at the changes that items have undergone as a result of edit and merge operations. The service also enables clients to examine the differences between two versions of an item.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice
    The standard i2 Analyze item retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve any version of any stored item, alone or in groups, in a variety of ways.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice
    The standard i2 Analyze network search service provides clients with the ability to perform network searches of various types against the latest versions of data, and to retrieve scored search results.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.purgeservice
    The i2 Analyze purge service provides clients with the ability to remove all trace of items and sets from the Analysis Repository.
    com.i2group.apollo.searchservice
    The standard i2 Analyze search service provides clients with the ability to perform searches of various types against the latest versions of data, and to retrieve scored search results.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.adminservice that throw InvalidArgumentException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IAdminService.createDataSource(Schema schema, String name)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IAdminService.setSchema(Schema) and IAdminService.setRepositoryName(String) instead.
      void IAdminService.initializeSecuritySchema(SecuritySchema securitySchema)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IAdminService.setSecuritySchema(SecuritySchema) instead.
      void IAdminService.setChartingSchemes(ChartingSchemeList chartingSchemeList)
      Sets the ChartingSchemes for this instance of i2 Analyze.
      void IAdminService.setRepositoryName(String name)
      Sets the human-readable name of the Analysis Repository for this instance of i2 Analyze.
      void IAdminService.setSchema(Schema schema)
      Sets the Schema for this instance of i2 Analyze.
      void IAdminService.setSecuritySchema(SecuritySchema securitySchema)
      Sets the SecuritySchema for this instance of i2 Analyze.
      void IAdminService.updateDataSourceSchema(Schema schema)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IAdminService.setSchema(Schema) instead.
      void IAdminService.updateSecuritySchema(SecuritySchema securitySchema)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IAdminService.setSecuritySchema(SecuritySchema) instead.

    • Uses of InvalidArgumentException in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.delpsservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.delpsservice that throw InvalidArgumentException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IDelpsService.createOrReplaceItems(String dataSourceId, List<Item> items)

    • Uses of InvalidArgumentException in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice that throw InvalidArgumentException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.dumbbellSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, SearchNode fromEntity, SearchNode link, SearchNode toEntity)
      Searches an external data source for dumbbells that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.expand(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, List<ItemIdentifier> seedItemIdentifiers, List<String> throughLinkTypes, List<String> toEntityTypes, int maxNumberOfLinks, boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks)
      Finds Links in an external data provider with the specified types (together with their associated ends), connected to the Entitys with the specified ItemIdentifiers.
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.fullTextSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString)
      Searches an external data provider for Items whose content includes the specified String, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.networkSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, NetworkSearchNodeList networkSearchCriteria)
      Searches an external data source for groups of Items that together meet the assembled criteria of the nodes in a network, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.search(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
      Searches an external data provider for Items that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

      Searches the external data subset with the specified ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier for dumbbells that meet a range of criteria, returning a SearchSummary.
      ExternalDataResults IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.expand(List<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups, boolean includeRetrievalBlockMap, int maxNumberOfLinks, boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks)
      Gets an ExternalDataResults that contains Links from an external data subset (together with their associated ends), connected to Entitys that are identified through the provenance information in the specified ProvenanceGroups.
      ExternalDataResults IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.getLatestItems(List<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups, boolean includeRetrievalBlockMap)
      Gets an ExternalDataResults that contains Items from an external data subset that are identified through the provenance information in the specified ProvenanceGroups.
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.initialize(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier)
      Initializes the service so that it is ready to receive search requests for the external data subset with the specified ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier.

      Retrieves SearchResults created by a previous call to networkSearch, allowing sorting and additional filtering to be carried out.
      SearchSummary IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.networkSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, NetworkSearchNodeList networkSearchCriteria)
      Searches the specified external data subset for groups of Items that together meet the assembled criteria of the nodes in a network, returning a SearchSummary.
      SearchResults IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.retrieve(String searchToken, DumbbellPart dumbbellPart, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos, SortInfo sortInfo, int maxResultCount, PageInfo pageInfo)
      Retrieves SearchResults created by a previous call to search or dumbbellSearch, allowing sorting and additional filtering to be carried out.
      SearchSummary IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.search(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
      Searches the specified external data subset for Items that meet a range of criteria, returning a SearchSummary.

      Validates the specified NetworkSearchNodeList according to the same rules as search, but without performing the search operation.

      Finds and returns the Links with the specified types (together with their associated ends with the specified types), connected to the Entitys with the specified ItemIdentifiers.

      Discovers Items that may be considered duplicates because they have matching values for certain characteristic PropertyTypes.

      Finds and returns, in paged form, the Links with the specified types (together with their associated ends with the specified types), connected to the Entitys with the specified ItemIdentifiers.

      Retrieves SearchResults created by a previous call to search or dumbbellSearch, allowing sorting and additional filtering to be carried out.

      Searches the Analysis Repository or an ELP stage for Items that meet a range of criteria, returning a SearchSummary.
